error.message: Parameter $database of method Drupal\content_calendar\ContentCalendarService::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Driver\mysql\Connection. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.
